meanings.sent1: She carefully retwists her hair to create a new style.
meanings.sent2: He retwists the rope to make it stronger.
meanings.sent3: The magician retwists the balloon animals into new shapes.
meanings.sent4: The plot of the story retwists unexpectedly at the end.
meanings.sent5: The dancer retwists her body into amazing shapes on stage.

meanings.sent1: He always retwists his mustache when he's nervous.
meanings.sent2: She retwists the lid on the jar to make sure it's closed tightly.
meanings.sent3: The cat playfully retwists the yarn around the room.
meanings.sent4: Time retwists memories, making them seem different than they were.
meanings.sent5: The wind retwists the fallen leaves into swirling patterns.

meanings.definition: The act of twisting again or differently.
meanings.sent1: Her retwists of the fabric give it a unique texture.
meanings.sent2: The retwists in the braid add an interesting detail to the hairstyle.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's retwists of old jokes make them fresh and funny again.
meanings.sent4: The retwists in the plot keep the audience engaged and surprised.
meanings.sent5: The artist's painting features intricate retwists of color that draw the eye.
